languages.text: {n}Джай пожимает плечами.{/n} "Деловые отношения могут быть разными — если вам нравится доминировать, я не против. С удовольствием послужу на благо {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}, пока моя голова остается на плечах".

traits.locale_text: {n}Джай пожимает плечами.{/n} "Деловые отношения могут быть разными — если вам нравится доминировать, я не против. С удовольствием послужу на благо Империума, пока моя голова остается на плечах".

languages.text: {n}Jae shrugs.{/n} "Every business relationship has its quirks — if you want to call the shots, I don't mind. I'll gladly serve for the good of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} as long as it keeps my head on my shoulders."
languages.original_text: {n}Джай пожимает плечами.{/n} "Деловые отношения могут быть разными — если вам нравится доминировать, я не против. С удовольствием послужу на благо {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}, пока моя голова остается на плечах".

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae shrugs.{/n} "Business relationships can vary — if you prefer domineering, I don't mind. I'll happily serve for the good of the Imperium as long as it means that my head stays on my shoulders."
{n}Jae shrugs.{/n} "Business relationships can vary — if you prefer domineering, I don't mind. I'll happily serve for the good of the Imperium as long as it means that my head stays on my shoulders."

{n}Jae shrugs.{/n} "Every business relationship has its quirks — if you want to call the shots, I don't mind. I'll happily serve for the good of the Imperium as long as it keeps my head on my shoulders."

{n}Jae shrugs.{/n} "Every business relationship has its quirks — if you want to call the shots, I don't mind. I'll happily serve for the good of the Imperium as long as it keeps my head on my shoulders."

{n}Jae shrugs.{/n} "Every business relationship has its quirks — if you want to call the shots, I don't mind. I'll gladly serve for the good of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} as long as it keeps my head on my shoulders."

languages.text: {n}婕伊耸了耸肩。{/n}“每段商业关系里，我的合作伙伴都会有各自的癖好。就算你愿意发号施令，我也并不介意。只要我的脑袋不用落地，我就很愿意为{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的利益服务。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae shrugs.{/n} "Every business relationship has its quirks — if you want to call the shots, I don't mind. I'll gladly serve for the good of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} as long as it keeps my head on my shoulders."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊耸了耸肩。{/n}“每段商业关系里，我的合作伙伴都会有各自的癖好。就算你愿意发号施令，我也并不介意。只要我的脑袋不用落地，我就很乐于为{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的利益服务。”

languages.text: {n}Jae se encoge de hombros.{/n} «En todas las relaciones comerciales hay singularidades. No me importa si quiere llevar las riendas, serviré al {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} siempre y cuando me mantenga con vida».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae shrugs.{/n} "Every business relationship has its quirks — if you want to call the shots, I don't mind. I'll gladly serve for the good of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} as long as it keeps my head on my shoulders."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae se encoge de hombros.{/n} «En todas las relaciones comerciales hay singularidades. No me importa si quiere llevar las riendas, serviré al {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} siempre y cuando me mantenga con vida».

languages.text: {n}ジェイは肩をすくめる。{/n}「どんなビジネス関係にも思いがけない事は付き物さ…アンタが決定権を持ちたいなら、こっちはそれでいい。自分で舵取りできるなら、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の利益のために喜んで奉仕するよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae shrugs.{/n} "Every business relationship has its quirks — if you want to call the shots, I don't mind. I'll gladly serve for the good of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} as long as it keeps my head on my shoulders."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは肩をすくめる。{/n}「どんなビジネス関係にも思いがけない事は付き物さ…アンタが決定権を持ちたいなら、こっちはそれでいい。自分で舵取りできるなら、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の利益のために喜んで奉仕するよ」

languages.text: {n}Jae zuckt mit den Schultern.{/n} "Jede Geschäftsbeziehung hat Ihre Eigenheiten – wenn Ihr das Sagen haben wollt, von mir aus. Ich diene mit Freuden dem Wohl des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g}, solange ich dadurch meinen Kopf auf den Schultern behalte."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae shrugs.{/n} "Every business relationship has its quirks — if you want to call the shots, I don't mind. I'll gladly serve for the good of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} as long as it keeps my head on my shoulders."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae zuckt mit den Schultern.{/n} "Jede Geschäftsbeziehung hat Ihre Eigenheiten – wenn Ihr das Sagen haben wollt, von mir aus. Ich diene mit Freuden dem Wohl des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g}, solange ich dadurch meinen Kopf auf den Schultern behalte."

languages.text: {n}Jae hausse les épaules.{/n} « Toutes les relations commerciales ont leurs petites particularités... Si vous voulez commander, grand bien vous fasse. Je servirai volontiers l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, tant que ça me permettra de rester en vie. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae shrugs.{/n} "Every business relationship has its quirks — if you want to call the shots, I don't mind. I'll gladly serve for the good of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} as long as it keeps my head on my shoulders."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae hausse les épaules.{/n} « Toutes les relations commerciales ont leurs petites particularités... Si vous voulez commander, grand bien vous fasse. Je servirai l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} de bon cœur, tant que ça me permettra de rester en vie. »

languages.text: {n}Jae omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Her iş ilişkisinin kendine özgü tuhaflıkları olur, kararları sen vermek istiyorsan bana uyar. Kellemi koltuğa almadığım sürece {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'un{/g} iyiliği için seve seve hizmet ederim."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae shrugs.{/n} "Every business relationship has its quirks — if you want to call the shots, I don't mind. I'll gladly serve for the good of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} as long as it keeps my head on my shoulders."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae omuzlarını silkiyor.{/n} "Her iş ilişkisinin kendine özgü tuhaflıkları olur, kararları sen vermek istiyorsan benim için sorun değil. Kellemi koltuğa almadığım sürece {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'un iyiliği için seve seve hizmet ederim."
